name: Havocation
description:
Hello! Thank you for visiting our page!

We are a team of 8 people who made this humble game during the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

We hope you enjoy it and don't hesitate to leave us a feedback.

Cheers,

The Havocation team

Gabin Guede - 2D Art https://www.artstation.com/gabin-g

Antoinette Stoll - 2D Art https://narr.artstation.com/

Manon Boutarfa - 3D Art https://www.artstation.com/manon_boutarfa

Chloe Morel - 3D Art https://www.artstation.com/jezzos

Sebastien Perouffe - Game Design www.linkedin.com/in/sebastien-perouffe

Benjamin Lorion - Game Design https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjamin-lorion

Alexis Crickx - Programming https://www.artstation.com/acrickx

Leonard Allain-Launay - Programming https://leonarda-l.github.io/
